salami slicing.translation[0].definition: the action of gradually removing or reducing something, by taking a small amount away at a time
The budget cuts have been made by a process of salami slicing.
salami slicing.translation[1].definition: the illegal act of stealing money from an organization by using a computer to remove extremely small amounts from its financial accounts over a period of time
A number of corporations have been subjected to salami slicing fraud.
an act of removing or reducing something by doing it very slowly and gradually, so people do not realize what is happening
The budget cuts have been made by a process of salami slicing.
